description:
Requireganizer is an advanced software application that streamlines iterative software development by leveraging ChatGPT to generate essential documentation and code. The application transforms a user-provided, human-written description of the desired software into a formal description, which serves as the foundation for multiple minor iterations within a major iteration of the development process.

The major iteration encompasses the generation of user stories, requirements, acceptance criteria, test scenarios, test cases, test code, and functional code. It also includes running retrospectives to address user concerns and updating specifications based on new or revised requirements. Throughout each iteration, ChatGPT cross-references previously generated materials to identify and flag inconsistencies for user review and potential resolution. By automating these crucial steps, Requireganizer streamlines the software development lifecycle, ensuring efficiency and consistency.
productOverview:
Requireganizer is a software application designed to facilitate an iterative software development process by generating necessary documentation and code with the help of ChatGPT. Starting with a human-written description of the desired software, the application guides users through multiple minor iterations to complete a major iteration of the software development process. Each major iteration consists of the following minor iterations:

Generate a formal description based on the human-written description.
Generate user stories based on the formal description.
Generate requirements based on the user stories.
Generate acceptance criteria based on the requirements.
Generate test scenarios and test cases based on acceptance criteria.
Generate test code based on test scenarios.
Generate code to satisfy tests.
Run retrospective to understand the concerns of the user in the process.
Assist the user in updating the specification and initiating the next major iteration based on new/updated requirements.

Throughout each iteration, the generated material from previous minor and major iterations is provided to ChatGPT. If any inconsistencies are identified, ChatGPT should highlight them for user attention and potential correction.

userStories.content: As a user, I want to be able to input a description of my desired software in English so that Requireganizer can generate user stories, requirements, and acceptance criteria using ChatGPT.
As a user, I want ChatGPT to validate my software description input to ensure it is in English and meets the minimum length requirement.
As a user, I want to be able to load a previously saved JSON file containing software description into Requireganizer.
As a user, I want to be able to add, edit, and remove items in the user stories, requirements, and acceptance criteria lists so that I can further customize and refine the project specifications.
As a user, I want to be able to export my generated user stories, requirements, and acceptance criteria in PDF, TXT, or JSON format, so that I can save, share, or use them in other tools.
As a user, I want to view the User Stories, Requirements, and Acceptance Criteria organized in separate tabs so that I can easily navigate and focus on each section.

requirements.content: Requireganizer shall provide a user interface for inputting a description of the desired software.
Requireganizer shall use ChatGPT to validate the input, ensuring it is in English and meets a minimum length requirement.
Requireganizer shall integrate with the ChatGPT API to send the software description as a prompt.
Requireganizer shall receive the generated user stories, requirements, and acceptance criteria from the ChatGPT API.
Requireganizer shall display the generated user stories, requirements, and acceptance criteria in a clear and organized format.
Requireganizer shall provide an option to export the generated content in various formats (PDF, TXT, JSON).
Requireganizer shall provide a feature to import a JSON file containing software description, allowing users to reload previously saved data.
Requireganizer shall provide a feature to add new items to the user stories, requirements, and acceptance criteria lists.
Requireganizer shall provide a feature to edit the generated user stories, requirements, and acceptance criteria.
Requireganizer shall provide a feature to remove existing items from the user stories, requirements, and acceptance criteria lists.
Requireganizer shall display the User Stories, Requirements, and Acceptance Criteria in separate tabs, allowing users to easily navigate between sections.

acceptanceCriteria.content: Test that when the user inputs a software description in English, it uses ChatGPT to validate the input and allows submission if it meets the minimum length requirement.
Test that when the user submits a software description, it sends the prompt to the ChatGPT API and receives a response containing user stories, requirements, and acceptance criteria.
It displays the generated user stories, requirements, and acceptance criteria in an organized and easy-to-read format on the user interface.
Test that the user can export the generated content in at least one of the supported formats (PDF, TXT, JSON).
It provides a feature to import a JSON file containing software description, enabling users to reload previously saved data and continue working with it.
Test that the user can add new items to the user stories, requirements, and acceptance criteria lists.
Test that the user can edit the generated user stories, requirements, and acceptance criteria to refine and customize the content.
Test that the user can remove existing items from the user stories, requirements, and acceptance criteria lists.
Test that the User Stories, Requirements, and Acceptance Criteria are displayed in separate tabs and can be easily navigated by the user.
